column1: Dr. '''Richard Sturch''' is an Anglican priest
column2: the Secretary of the [http://www.charleswilliamssociety.org.uk/index.html Charles Williams Society]
column3: and also active in [[The Tolkien Society]]. He wrote several essays and books about Christianity and the [[Inklings]].

column1: *[[2008]]: ''[[The Ring Goes Ever On: Proceedings of the Tolkien 2005 Conference]]''
*[[2012]]: ''VATES - The Journal of New Latin Poetry''
**"J.R.R. Tolkien ex Anglico sermone in Latinum conversa a Ricardo Stuch"
